intro.title: Rite of Discovery — Intro
intro.p1: A family tradition. A quiet choice. Tonight it begins.
intro.p2: Pay attention to details — they might guide your choices.

hallway.title: The Dim Hallway
hallway.body: A heavy metal door blocks your path. A keypad glows faintly.

keypad.title: Keypad Lock
keypad.body: Enter the 4-digit code found on the old parchment.

wires.title: Maintenance Panel
wires.body: Exposed wires hum with power. Connect them correctly to restore light.

chamber.title: The Inner Chamber
chamber.body: The air is still here. You've passed the first trial.
